com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology

Interface IApplicationRegistration

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationRegistration

    public interface IApplicationRegistration
extends java.io.Serializable
    Serves as an entry in an IDistributedApplicationRegistry and defines the data stored there.
    Author:
    dawood

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IApplicationDescriptor getApplicationDescriptor() 
      java.net.InetAddress getIPAddress()
      Get the IP address in the URI or null if none present.
      java.net.URI getURI()
      Get the URI representing the address that is used to send messages to the application associated with this registration.

    • Method Detail

      • getApplicationDescriptor

        IApplicationDescriptor getApplicationDescriptor()

      • getURI

        java.net.URI getURI()
        Get the URI representing the address that is used to send messages to the application associated with this registration. The URI can be used with MessageSenderRegistry.getSender() to get the implementation that can be used to send messages to the URI.
        Returns:

      • getIPAddress

        java.net.InetAddress getIPAddress()
        Get the IP address in the URI or null if none present.
        Returns:
        null or host URI.
